name: Remember Your Waltz
description:
Remember Your Waltz is Matthew Mayer's 9th Solo Piano Album (and his first all-original solo album since 2003). Released in the Fall of 2011, the CD is comprised of 11 original solo piano compositions.

1) Remember Your Waltz
2) Memory of a Grassy Field
3) Canistota Bike Ride
4) Stay Close to Me
5) The Young Warrior
6) Innocence
7) Curiosity Takes a Train
8) Samantha's Dance
9) 4 AM
10) Dreams IV
11) Childhood Eyes

name: Beyond
description: The Beyond Album was released in 2003 with rave reviews. Here is what Kathy Parson’s of solopianopublications.com had to say about this project. “There isn’t a weak track (lucky thirteen of them!) on this CD, and the moods and emotions are varied. Matthew Mayer’s impressive playing skills and technique allow him to convey whatever he desires and his passions come through the music incredibly well. I’m hooked! This isn’t a CD to fall sleep to, but I certainly enjoyed waking up to it for a week or so! Recommended! BEYOND 1. A New Day 2. Ocean Sunset 3. Beyond 4. No Regrets 5. The Burning Candle 6. Test the Waters 7. Dreams III 8. The Darkness 9. Max’s Song 10. Watching the Clock 11. Fly Away 12. A Walk Through Life 13. Good-Bye

name: Beyond Sheet Music
description:
Beyond has become Matthew Mayer's most requested and popular solo piano songs:

- Recently reached over 100,000 views on YouTube

- Recognized as a Top 10 Instrumental Song by the International Acoustic Music Awards (IAMA)

- Featured in Reviews New Age "The Best of Reviews New Age: The Piano" Album

Order your music and be a part of the #IPLAYBEYOND Project! 

Video yourself performing Beyond, and upload it on our Twitter Page at #IPlayBeyond

Create - Collaborate - and Share!

When ordering, please be sure to include the email address that you would like your PDF Beyond Sheet Music delivered.

(We strive to have your music sent to you within hours of your order!)

name: Merry Christmas Volume I
description: Matt’s first Holiday album “Merry Christmas” features 13 traditional Christmas songs including, “God Rest Ye Merry Gentlemen,” “Jungle Bells,” and “Angels We Have Heard on High.” Kathy Parson’s of solopianopublications.com had this to say about it: “When you listen to as much solo piano Christmas music as I do, it can be difficult to find a CD that is different enough to stand out from the others, but Matthew Mayer has succeeded well with sparkling arrangements of favorite traditional Christmas tunes that keep most of the melodies intact but are still different enough for jaded ears like mine to get excited about. Mayer has already assembled an impressive body of work with much more on the horizon. If he is a new artist for you, be sure to check him out! “Merry Christmas” is an outstanding Christmas album that should be a part of your holiday festivities, big and small. Enjoy!” VOLUME I 1. Angels We Have Heard On High 2. Intro Melody 3. God Rest Ye Merry Gentlemen 4. Jingle Bells 5. O Little Town of Bethlehem 6. Away in a Manger 7. It Came Upon the Midnight Clear 8. What Child is This 9. O Come All Ye Faithful 10. O Holy Night 11. Silent Night 12. We Wish You a Merry Christmas 13. Auld Lang Syne

name: Merry Christmas Volume II
description: Matt’s second Holiday Album “Merry Christmas Vol. II” was released in the 2006 Holiday season with another 13 traditional Christmas favorites including “I Saw Three Ships”, “Patapan”, “Toyland”, “The Coventry Carol”, and “We Three Kings of Orient Are.” Together, Merry Christmas Volumes I & II total over 75 minutes of solo piano Christmas music. VOLUME II 1. Jolly Old St. Nicholas 2. Deck the Halls 3. Patapan 4. Christmas Time is Here Again (Original) 5. I Saw Three Ships 6. Toyland 7. O Come, O Come, Emmanuel 8. Hark the Herald Angels Sing 9. The Coventry Carol 10. Up On the Housetop 11. We Three Kings of Orient Are 12. The Wassail Song 13. We Wish You a Merry Christmas(Vol.I)

name: Merry Christmas Package
description: MERRY CHRISTMAS VOLUMES I AND II Enjoy over 75 minutes of solo piano holiday music with “Merry Christmas Vol. I and II." "Matthew Mayer is one of those great pianists who has given a particular voice famous traditional melodies, but reaching one level, a point in which the originality and tradition come together, where the melodies arise through notes, popular music who was born between fascinating changes and a great technique to discover with amazement. This is called Merry Christmas." - Spain's Reviews New Age. “Merry Christmas Vol. I and II” combined provides over 75 minutes of solo piano holiday music. VOLUME I 1. Angels We Have Heard On High 2. Intro Melody 3. God Rest Ye Merry Gentlemen 4. Jingle Bells 5. O Little Town of Bethlehem 6. Away in a Manger 7. It Came Upon the Midnight Clear 8. What Child is This 9. O Come All Ye Faithful 10. O Holy Night 11. Silent Night 12. We Wish You a Merry Christmas 13. Auld Lang Syne VOLUME II 1. Jolly Old St. Nicholas 2. Deck the Halls 3. Patapan 4. Christmas Time is Here Again (Original) 5. I Saw Three Ships 6. Toyland 7. O Come, O Come, Emmanuel 8. Hark the Herald Angels Sing 9. The Coventry Carol 10. Up On the Housetop 11. We Three Kings of Orient Are 12. The Wassail Song 13. We Wish You a Merry Christmas

name: Crossing the Bridge
description:
It all started in 1999 with the release of “Crossing the Bridge.” This CD is a collection of Matt’s earliest recordings including his favorite “Dreams.” The CD contains 12 all original solo piano compositions and has recently been re-designed with a new front cover look.

1)  the unknown
2)  alone
3)  dreams
4)  staring out the window
5)  keep going
6)  send me an angel
7)  the victory
8)  there's always tomorrow
9)  moving on
10) no warning
11) in the beginning
12) crossing the bridge

This CD is now available for Sale!!

name: Inside Your Mind
description: Matthew Mayer’s 6th CD “Inside Your Mind” is a continuous hour of non-pattern original solo piano meditation music. This CD is PERFECT for those nights when you want to have something light and calming playing in the background, to relax, to meditate, and to reflect. If you like the sound of soft piano music playing as you are drifting to sleep, then this CD is for you!

name: Reflections
description: Reflections is a mixture of previously recorded and original solo piano compositions along with several Christian favorites such as “Beautiful Savior”, “Amazing Grace”, Robert Dufford’s “Be Not Afraid”, along with Michael Card and John Thompson’s “El Shaddai.” Some of Matt’s original solo piano songs on this album include “Dreams”, “A New Day”, and “In the Beginning.” This CD was done in partnership with His Essence LLC of hisessence.com. REFLECTIONS 1. Reflections 2. Dreams 3. El Shaddai 4. Beautiful Savior 5. A New Day 6. Be Not Afraid 7. In the Beginning 8. Send Me An Angel 9. Amazing Grace 10. The Arrival 11. If You Knew 12. What Child Is This 13. Good Bye 14. Cleansing Rain

name: The Serenity Package
description: Find your Serenity with two of Matt’s CDs that are perfect for background music. “Inside Your Mind” is a continuous one hour solo piano track with non-patterned solo piano music throughout. “Full of Grace” contains several reflective pieces, including a 22 minutes meditation piece.

name: Full of Grace
description: Mayer’s 8th CD and newest production “Full of Grace” has just been released in partnership with the inspirational radio show ‘Mary’s Touch’ based out of Austin, Texas. “Full of Grace” is featured on www.marystouch.org playing with the remarkable stories of those whose lives have been touched by the Blessed Mother. This album includes a 22 minute meditation piece titled “The Mysteries” which can be used for prayer and meditation. FULL OF GRACE 1. Sweet Marian Girl 2. Reflections 3. Immaculate Mary 4. Dreams 5. Night’s Surrender 6. Full of Grace 7. A New Day 8. O Sanctissima 9. Mother at the Cross 10. A Child’s Prayer 11. Amazing Grace 12. The Burning Candle 13. A Walk Through Life 14. Good Bye 15. The Mysteries

name: Sharing the Light
description: A year after the release of “Crossing the Bridge,” Matt followed up with another 12 original solo piano compositions in a compilation titled “Sharing the Light.” This album has also been redesigned since its release in the spring of 2000. Some of the songs on this album include “The Passing of Time”, “If You Knew”, and “Dream II.”

name: SoloPiano.com 15oz Mug
description:
The one and only SoloPiano.com Bistro Mug holds 15oz of beverage joy! Perfect for when you are browsing your favorite websites (solopiano.com), when you are playing piano, reading, listening to your favorite music, and for that hot cup of coffee early in the morning! Funds collected on the purchase of this mug help in the operating costs of "The Stream" at SoloPiano.com, and our hosting expense for our main site.

Facts:
Recommended Handwash
Microwavable Safe
Made in China
$5.00 Shipping Charge for each Mug
It's a fantastic mug!!

name: 8 CD Box Set
description: Enjoy Matts collection of CDs since his Crossing the Bridge release in 1999! (Sharing the Light Not Included due to Sold Out) On Sale Now!
